I first worked with Brian in ‘99 and suggested to @VinceMcMahon we hire Brian as @WWE’s first ever writer. 
Boss (Vince) agreed.
Wrestlers hated it.
I loved it.
He became WWE’s head writer for years 🔥😁
Today he’s VP of @SevenBucksProd 
And releasing this BOOK you should read!👍🏾

@bobbybonesshow @1PunchDeku @JellyRoll615 Happy big 5th to your daughter!! And I love brother @JellyRoll615’s music. Sings from the soul. Listen to “only” when you have a min. 
If you’ve ever “gone thru it” which we all have, that song cuts deep 🥃

WEST COAST you’re up NOW! 
8PM PST on @NBC. 

Here’s tonight’s #YoungRock episode that already lit the EAST COAST on fire 🔥🔥🔥😊

In March of 1996, I had my first ever match. Never wrestled before in my life and I had to do it in front of these wrestling legends.
Enjoy the show https://t.co/HldFygMW9Q

Thanks Scott, the three of us wanted to write a special episode that was befitting of that definitive night back in March of 1996. 
Wild, wild wrestling journey it’s been for myself, Brian & Hiram.  
#YoungRock

You and @hhgarcia41 did a great job writing this episode mi amigo.
This was a special one.

Here we go… 
We’re 10 minutes out from a very special episode of #YoungRock @8pm on @NBC! 
This episode was written by yours truly, @bfg728 & @hhgarcia41 ✍🏽
Inspired by my first @wwe match!
If you LOVE the episode, I take full credit 😈
If you hate it, I blame Brian & Hiram! 😂

Appreciate everyone’s excitement about tonight’s episode of #YoungRock.
The night my life changed.
My first ever wrestling match, thrown head first into the fire to 15,000 unmerciful wrestling fans💀
Tonight’s episode was written by myself, @bfg728 & @hhgarcia41.
ENJOY!
